import { useState } from "react"; import "./Form.css"; function Form() { const [result, setResult] = useState(" "); const handleClick = (e) => { setResult(result.concat(e.target.name)); }; const clear = (e) => { setResult(" "); }; const backspace = (e) => { setResult(result.slice(0, result.length - 1)); }; const calculate = () => { setResult(eval(result).toString()); }; return (

Calculator

); } export default Form;
